page.title: 01Review of Blithfield area
page.content: Blithfield reservoir dominates this rural area & attracts many visitors. its presence has resulted in the formation of bird, sailing, angling and sub-aqua clubs. Agriculture is the main industry with cttle, dairy cows and sheep. Places of residence are few consisting of old farm houses, cottages and only 4 small groups of houses at Admaston, Stockwell heath, Seedcroft and part of Colton. electricity and water are available but no gas. Mostly a septic tank or cesspit is used. The nearest shopping Ruvgeley & Uttoxeter, there is no public transport except buses for school children. The landscape is attractive with many types of trees and most fields heded, it is rich in wild lie and flora.
